mapper.select: SELECT id,userId,userName,type, title, content, tags, createdAt, updatedAt, viewCount, likeCount, commentCount FROM posts WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE posts
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
tags = #{tags, typeHandler=org.com.code.im.utils.StringListToJsonConverter},
WHERE id = #{id} AND userId = #{userId}
UPDATE posts SET viewCount = viewCount + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM posts WHERE id = #{id} AND userId = #{userId}
